name: Topple Foe
summary: You take advantage of the opening created by your ally to tip your foe off their feet.
description:
You take advantage of the opening created by your ally to tip your foe off their feet. Attempt an Athletics check to Trip the target of the triggering attack.Traits

Archetype: This feat belongs to an archetype.
trigger: An ally succeeds at a melee Strike against an opponent you are both adjacent to.
